scripts.build:dev: pnpm cleanup && pnpm env-json:schema:generate && pnpm copy:assets && run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm image:docker:build"
scripts.build:prod: pnpm cleanup && pnpm env-json:schema:generate && pnpm copy:assets && run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm image:docker:build"
scripts.image:docker:build: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.registry)" -a "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.account)" -n "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.name)" -t "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.buildTags)" --build-arg "KIE_SANDBOX_DEFAULT_PORT=$(build-env kieSandbox.image.port)"
scripts.image:podman:build: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.registry)" -a "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.account)" -n "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.name)" -t "$(build-env kieSandbox.image.buildTags)" --build-arg "KIE_SANDBOX_DEFAULT_PORT=$(build-env kieSandbox.image.port)" -e podman
